caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. SHANNON LEE

opinion.opinion_text:
COA: 218245, Oakland CC: 96-149453-FH.
On order of the Court, the delayed application for leave to appeal from the July 7, 2000 decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.Page 948
